name: Pot Duel
description:
Its the staple of many games to smash pots to hopefully find loot, This game takes a different approach however.

There is not loot... And there is no adventure.

Just two pots with cowboy hats and revolvers and a score to settle.

Welcome to not so wild west.

CONTROLS: A = MOVE LEFT

                                  D= MOVE RIGHT

                                  W= JUMP

USE MOUSE  TO AIM AND CLICK LEFT MOUSE BUTTON TO FIRE.
